statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET theme='Dark', timezone='GMT' WHERE email='alice@example.com';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET theme = 'dark', language = 'Spanish', timezone = 'GMT+2' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com', phone_number='+1234567890', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme='dark', language='Spanish' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET language='French', theme='Dark', timezone='GMT+2' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET bio = 'Updated bio for User 123' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE preferences SET language = 'Spanish', theme = 'Dark' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', bio='Passionate developer and tech enthusiast' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE preferences SET theme='dark', notification_enabled=true WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_contacts SET contact_phone = '123-456-7890', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com', user_id = 123, contact_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE contact_id = 456;
